note.p: Career: Went to India (1821); Private Secretary to Lord Elphinstone (1836); Commissioner for the administration of the Northern Sirkars (to 1854); retired from the Civil Service (1860); wrote on the coins of Southern India (1885); had poor eyesight and eventually went blind
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1887 vol 42 pp viii-ix signed by P L S
Notes: Cert X, 323i is a list of papers attached to the certificate
